text: Bhayabhaktulu galavariki vagdanam ceyabadina svargam yokka udaharana ila vundi: Andulo vasana mariyu rangu marani niti selayellu untayi mariyu ruci marani pala kaluvalu untayi mariyu andulo tragevariki madhuranga vunde madyapanapu kaluvalu untayi mariyu andulo sud'dhamaina tene kaluvalu untayi. Mariyu vari koraku andulo anni rakala manci phalalu mariyu vari prabhuvu nundi ksamapana kuda vuntayi. Ilanti vadu - narakagnilo sasvatanga undi salasala kage nitini tragenduku ivvabadi, danito pregulu koyabadinatlu badhapadevanito - samanudu kagalada
